name: MongoCollection.update
purpose: Update records based on a given criteria

return.description: Returns if the update was successfully sent to the database.

errors:
Throws MongoCursorException if the "safe" option is 
   set and the update fails.

changelog.change:
Changed "options" parameter from boolean to array.  Pre-1.0.1, the
        second parameter was an optional boolean value specifying an upsert.
